original_solution_mapping.L1: Marianne is 20 - 8 = <<20-8=12>>12 years older than Bella.
original_solution_mapping.L3: So, Marianne will be 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30 years old then.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3069.
    Returns: Marianne's age when Bella turns 18.
    """
    # L1
    marianne_initial_age = 20 # Marianne was 20 years old
    bella_initial_age = 8 # Bella was 8 years old
    age_difference = marianne_initial_age - bella_initial_age

    # L2
    bella_target_age = 18 # Bella turns 18
    years_to_add = bella_target_age - bella_initial_age

    # L3
    marianne_final_age = marianne_initial_age + years_to_add

    # FA
    answer = marianne_final_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Marianne is {marianne_initial_age} - {bella_initial_age} = <<{marianne_initial_age}-{bella_initial_age}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years older than Bella.
So, Marianne will be {marianne_initial_age} + {years_to_add} = <<{marianne_initial_age}+{years_to_add}={marianne_final_age}>>{marianne_final_age} years old then.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Marianne is 20 - 8 = <<20-8=12>>12 years older than Bella.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'years_to_add' (value: 10) was reported instead of 'marianne_final_age' (value: 30).
